dict.string: WaterDrop uses Bluetooth to discover and connect to nearby devices for secure peer-to-peer file transfers. This allows you to share files directly between devices without requiring an internet connection.
WaterDrop uses Bluetooth to advertise this device to nearby WaterDrop devices for peer-to-peer file sharing connections.
WaterDrop uses local network access to establish secure peer-to-peer connections with nearby devices for file transfers using MultipeerConnectivity.
